Grammar:    DataElement 6.0
Namespace:  choiceExplicitRestrictionInSubclass

// Need counterexample where the child values are not subclasses of the parent's value class, which is an error
// Need counterexample where the child adds a choice not given in the parent, which is an error (for example, if Child.Value included Quantity)

Entry:    ParentWithAnyDateTypeValue
Value:    DateType

    Abstract:  DateType
    Description:    "Parent for several date types"

Entry:    ChildWithSpecificDateTypes
Parent:   ParentWithAnyDateTypeValue
Value:    DateString or DateDate or DateRange

Element:  DateString
Parent:   DateType
Value:    string

Element:  DateDate
Parent:   DateType
Value:    date

Element:  DateRange
Parent:   DateType
Property: LowDate 1..1
Property: HighDate 0..1

    Element:    LowDate
    Value:      date

    Element:    HighDate
    Value:      date
